# NSScroller.ArrowPosition

**Enumeration**

These constants specify where the scroller’s buttons appear and are used by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScroller/arrowsPosition] property.

## Declaration

```swift
enum ArrowPosition
```

## Constants

- **NSScroller.ArrowPosition.scrollerArrowsMaxEnd**: Buttons at bottom or right. This constant has been deprecated.
- **NSScroller.ArrowPosition.scrollerArrowsMinEnd**: Buttons at top or left. This has been deprecated.
- **scrollerArrowsDefaultSetting**: Buttons are displayed according to the system-wide appearance preferences.
- **NSScroller.ArrowPosition.scrollerArrowsNone**: No buttons.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **NSScroller.Style**: Constants to specify the scroller style.
- **NSScroller.KnobStyle**: Specify different knob styles.
- **NSScroller.Part**: These constants specify the different parts of the scroller:
- **NSScroller.Arrow**: These constants describe the two scroller buttons and are used by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScroller/drawArrow(_:highlight:)].
- **NSScroller.UsableParts**: These constants specify which parts of the scroller are visible.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
